doctor.bio: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a board-certified cardiologist with over 12 years of experience in treating cardiovascular diseases. She specializes in interventional cardiology and preventive heart care. Dr. Johnson completed her fellowship at Massachusetts General Hospital and has published numerous research papers on innovative cardiac treatments.

medicalRecords.medicalHistory: Diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes in 2018. Hypertension diagnosed in 2020. Appendectomy in 2005.
medicalRecords.prescriptions: Lisinopril 10mg daily for blood pressure, Metformin 500mg twice daily for diabetes
medicalRecords.doctorNotes: Patient is responding well to current treatment plan. Recommend continuing medications and monitoring blood sugar levels. Next follow-up in 3 months.
medicalRecords.healthGoals:
1. Maintain blood sugar below 130 mg/dL
2. Exercise at least 30 minutes daily
3. Lose 5kg in next 6 months

reviews.reviewText: Dr. was very professional and took time to explain my condition in detail. Highly recommended!
Good consultation but had to wait longer than expected.
Excellent diagnosis and treatment plan. Feeling much better after following doctor's advice.
Average experience. Doctor seemed a bit rushed during the consultation.
One of the best doctors I've consulted. Very thorough and caring approach.
Good experience overall. Prescription was effective.
Exceptional service. Doctor went above and beyond to help me understand my treatment options.
Not satisfied with the consultation. Felt dismissed and didn't get clear answers.
Professional and knowledgeable. Would recommend to others.
The doctor was very patient and answered all my questions. Great bedside manner!
Consultation was okay, but the follow-up instructions weren't very clear.
Excellent doctor! Took time to understand my concerns and provided a comprehensive treatment plan.
Good experience overall. The waiting time was minimal and the consultation was thorough.
Very disappointing. The doctor seemed disinterested and didn't address my main concerns.
Outstanding care! The doctor was very attentive and provided clear explanations.
Positive experience. The prescription worked well for my condition.
Highly recommend this doctor. Very professional and caring approach.
Average consultation. Expected more detailed advice for my condition.
Good doctor. Explained things clearly and was patient with my questions.
Exceptional care! The doctor was very thorough and compassionate.
